categories.name: Limited Editions
categories.description: Here you’ll find rare and/or seasonal coffees, to give a special aroma to special moments.

categories.name: Ristretto
categories.description: An all-time favorite, now in two intense and creamy versions for the Vertuo system.

categories.name: Reviving Origins
categories.description: With the Reviving Origins range, you can seasonally enjoy amazing coffees from unique origins that were almost lost due to conflicts or natural disasters, but which we managed to recover.

categories.name: Espresso&Double Espresso
categories.description: There are moments when we just want one Espresso, and then there are moments when we want... two! Whatever your desire, make it happen with this Vertuo range.

categories.name: Gran Lungo&Mug
categories.description: How much time fits in a Nespresso moment? With the Gran Lungo&Mug Vertuo range, the answer is simple: as long as you want.

categories.name: Craft Brew
categories.description: Coffees inspired by different preparation techniques? Yes! Discover the Vertuo Craft Brew range that includes, for example, techniques inspired by filter coffee, and share good times with your loved ones!

categories.name: Coffee+
categories.description: Your Nespresso moment… with an extra. Two new coffees with more caffeine (compared to the regular blend) and a new coffee with ginseng extract.

categories.name: Barista Creations
categories.description: Whether it's a cappuccino or a latte, with these Nespresso coffees it's never been easier to awaken the Barista that lives in you.

products.name: Seasonal Delight Spices
products.headline: SWEET AND BROWN SPICES AND FRUITY

products.name: Vertuo Trio Pack (30 capsules)
products.headline: CONTAINS: IL CAFFÈ (X10), ALTISSIO (X10), DOUBLE ESPRESSO SCURO (X10)
